summary: Diff adds a DeltaV3-branded UI shell with header/main/footer, black/purple theme tokens, DuckDuckGo Instant Answer API client + search page with loading/error and fallback open-in-DDG action, plus a Settings page to change/persist primary accent color via localStorage. Backend remains a single empty Motoko actor. However, the diff does not provide evidence that the uploaded logo image file itself is included as a frontend static asset, and the search results rendering/link clickability is truncated so cannot be fully verified from the provided summary. Several unrequested features/scaffolding (Internet Identity + actor/react-query hooks, caffeine.ai footer credit) were added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include the uploaded image (148783974.png) as a frontend static asset (not served from backend) and use it as the site logo.
missing_requirements.reason: The code references the logo at "/assets/148783974.png", but the diff summary does not show an added static asset file (e.g., under frontend/public/assets or similar). Without the binary asset appearing in the diff summary, inclusion as a frontend static asset cannot be confirmed from evidence provided.

missing_requirements.requirement: Display a results list with clickable outbound links (titles/snippets when available).
missing_requirements.reason: The SearchPage file is truncated right when it begins rendering the results section, so the presence of clickable links/titles/snippets in the rendered list cannot be verified from the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider and identity/actor scaffolding (react-query actor creation, identity persistence/management).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly focuses on a branded search UI + theme settings and does not request authentication or backend actor client hooks. Adding II/actor scaffolding is extra functionality beyond the stated requirements/non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer promotional/attribution link to caffeine.ai (“Built with ... caffeine.ai”).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in requirements; introduces additional branding unrelated to DeltaV3.org branding request.
